items.title: ThisJustIn
items.subtitle: Gen-AI Powered Personalized Short-Form Video News
items.description: A personalized news platform with custom political alignment algorithm, E2E encrypted messaging, and hybrid AI-powered search â€” built for iOS with a FastAPI backend on AWS.
highlights: Custom political alignment algorithm for content personalization
E2E encrypted messaging with Signal Protocol patterns
Hybrid search: BM25 + pgvector + OpenSearch + Bedrock embeddings
Multi-role Docker containers on AWS ECS/Fargate
CI/CD with GitHub Actions and AWS ECR
SwiftUI/UIKit iOS app with Supabase RealTime

items.title: Job Aggregator AI Agent
items.subtitle: Conversational Job Recommendation System
items.description: An intelligent system that parses resumes, scrapes 1000+ job listings, and matches them using AI embeddings with a conversational interface.

items.title: Lunar Crater Detection
items.subtitle: Deep Learning for Lunar Surface Analysis
items.description: Deep learning model detecting craters on the lunar surface from Chandrayaan-2 satellite imagery. Published in the Journal of the Indian Society of Remote Sensing.

items.title: Image Captioning System
items.subtitle: Multi-Modal Recognition & Caption Generation
items.description: Multi-model system using LSTM and Feed Forward Neural Networks on the Flickr30k dataset, achieving 78% accuracy in image recognition and captioning.

items.title: Mental Health in Tech Analysis
items.subtitle: Data Analysis & Bayesian Methods
items.description: Deep analysis of survey data correlating workplace conditions and mental health in tech using statistical and Bayesian methods.

items.title: ML Video Processing Pipeline
items.subtitle: C++ Multi-Threaded ML Pipeline with CUDA
items.description: Large-scale video processing pipeline using C++ for multiple ML models with CUDA acceleration, built with a team of 30 at Tata Elxsi.

items.title: Driver Drowsiness Detection
items.subtitle: Real-Time Driver Monitoring System
items.description: Real-time system using OpenCV for facial landmarks and a CNN model to detect drowsiness with early yawning warnings.
